website_summaries.verdict: The Sony BDP-S370 is cheap, but it does everything you could want from a Blu-ray player, and more. There's really nothing that we can complain about
pros: playback of DivX and high-definition MKV H.264 files

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Blue-Ray ... 8 years and counting
customer_reviews.text: Still works great after 8 years. Very happy with it. Did have to buy a wireless adapter to use it with wi-fi (was expensive ~$90) but was much easier the running an internet cable to the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Louis J. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Works good for me.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this player along with the usb wifi adaptor and have been playing with it now for a couple of weeks. The player needed an update and that went smoothly. I'm not sure what other people are saying about only being able to watch Netflix movies in your que because my wife has picked several movies that weren't in the que. We basically have the same availability as with the PS3 that died on us. The unit is not super fast to load a movie but it's far from slow...20 seconds or so? Plenty of options to adjust the audio and video output and it sincs with my Bravia flat screen too. Great player. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great blue-ray player for an incredible price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a week, and I love it. Some people on Amazon were complaining about having to put movies into their que before being able to view them with this player with some services...I say "so what?" For $100.00, I can do that...My computer is connected to my tv as well, so it's not that much of on inconvenience. I'll update if I have any problems, but so far this player has proven to be excellent. Great picture, excellent sound, and my regular DVDs seem to look better when played on this unit as well. Not sure what else a person would want.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: First Blu-Ray Player
customer_reviews.text: This is our first blu-ray player. We specifically wanted one that was wifi ready so that we could stream movies as well as watch DVDs. It was extremely easy to set up and has been great to use for both dvds and streaming. Connecting it to our streaming accounts (or even creating new ones with Sony's VOD service) has been super easy. The only negative was having to purchase the Sony wifi adapter, rather than the ability to use one we already had or buy a cheaper one. We did manage to pick this up on here when it was on sale for less than $100 so that was a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Sony stuff just works
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a Samsung BD-C5500 1080p Blu-ray Disc Player...I loved the feature set and design but unfortunately it wouldn't play most of my SD DVD's and it had an image and sound quality issue (Yes I downloaded all the updates). Amazon let me return the Samsung and I purchased the Sony BDP-S370 instead. I don't care for the design as much as the Samsung and I miss VUDU which the Sony doesn't have but I do love the fact that it simply works. It plays every DVD in my collection and the streaming functionality is great. If you want a product that won't give you any trouble stick with Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fonner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Blu-ray Player
customer_reviews.text: This product is an absolutely incredible value. It is hooked up to our new HD66 Optoma projector and the video quality is outstanding. Even more impressive is the quality and layout of the menus and software that runs the player. I was expecting clunky/slow menus but everything is incredibly smooth. As a bonus the integration with Netflix and Amazon VOD, along with NPR and Pandora, is really smooth and well layed out. Pros: Great Picture Easy Setup Great Price Smooth Netflix and Amazon VOD Pandora and NPR Integration Cons: I really have nothing bad to say
customer_reviews.author: hoosierhill

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a few months...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mainly for its ability to receive wifi....It worked for a few months, and then it just quit working....I would not purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent budget component
customer_reviews.text: Sony's BD-S370 is a very light weight machine. While it seems fragile the proof is in the using. Thus far every disc we've watched has had excellent picture quality and the surround decoding is just as good. Since my monitor is only 1080i compatible I can't comment on the Sony's full capability in HD, but what it does with my current monitor is very satisfying. For the money, and now that Oppo seems to be discontinuing all of its mid-priced highly regarded players, I'd say this Sony is the next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: My TV has several HDMI inputs. When this unit is turned on and a DVD is loaded, it somehow asserts itself causing my TV to automatically switch to it's HDMI input. Very cool! I'll need to dig through the manual a bit more, but if you pause the DVD/BD and go away for say.. more that 1/2 hour, this unit will turn off then forget where you were in the disk when you turn it on. Frustrating, but I'm sure there might be some setting which I haven't found to prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. James

customer_reviews.title: Sony ROCKS!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Sony blu ray player we have purchased thru Amazon. Nothing can beat a Sony- "anything". I am so pleased with the price, look, and function of this player. Updated from the one we got a year ago, this one is naturally smaller (everything electronic always seems to get smaller every year), but the quality is the same. I love it when you can buy something and know before it's delivered that you will truly be satisfied. That is the way my family feels about Sony products. We are convinced. They are good.
customer_reviews.author: HannaH

customer_reviews.title: Affordable High Quality Blu-Ray
customer_reviews.text: This Blu-Ray Disc Player is top notch for the money. It has an easy set up, excellent picture contrast, full 1080p, and WI-FI capability. It has a sleek design that looks really nice and easy operation features. I got this as my first blu-ray player and it is excellent. The shipping and handling was reasonable and I got it in about six days. So if you are looking for a blu-ray that won't empty your pockets while getting great performance quality, consider the Sony BDP-S370, you will not be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Augusto50

customer_reviews.title: Not all the parts are included.
customer_reviews.text: Package did not include remote, cabling, or manual as indicated. Getting through menus or pausing discs is impossible without it. I even paid for expedited shipping. What a waste! Now I have to order a remote as well. Next time I'll just defer to eBay for used items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy setup. Wireless. You don't Need Sony's Wireless just buy a wireless access point Loaded with full Internet features Use of Android as a remote...NICE Appears to upscale very well Cons: I would like more internet choices than what is given Not many remotes supported for TV option on remote Barks when loading new section. Not bad just strange Overall for the money a good player. I did a lot of research and I have a Scottish heritage so I was looking for cheap. This player had all I needed. I would recommend it to others looking for cheap with usable features.
customer_reviews.author: John V. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nice player but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this Blu-ray player. The only thing which this player does not provide is built in wireless card. It only has Ethernet port or USB port. You have to purchase a USB wireless device to connect to your wireless network at home or connect it to an Ethernet port. Other than that I don't see any flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: good blu ray
customer_reviews.text: First of all I would like to say I bought this knowing there was NO WIFI. It's an adquate player with entry level features. Seems well built and was easy to setup. My only complaint is that I thought I would be able to download widgets off the bravia website, but can't. Netflix streams great and the music channels are nice. I got a great price on Amazon and I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jeff fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great performance
customer_reviews.text: Bought this player a month ago and I am happy with it. This is my first BluRay player and I can see the difference between DVD and BR quality. Disc (Blu Ray) load is fast, takes merely 7-8 seconds. I connected the player to my router through the Ethernet cable and everything works. I don't have any complaints at all. The player is very quiet. Netflix works great (both the discs and the streaming). Love it. Definitely would recommend this one to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: capitalone

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with my Sony TV. No problems with it. Boots kinda slow, but this is my first blu-ray so nothing else to compare it to. I did not read the description closely enough; did not know it does not come with HDMI cable. But found a cable on Amazon at good price. Update: now that I have had this player for some time I am wishing I had bought a better one. Have to reboot it about once a month.
customer_reviews.author: holyfire

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly its holding up quite well so far & i like it. came in a good condition & the ...
customer_reviews.text: for it being a used model, surprisingly its holding up quite well so far & i like it. came in a good condition & the disc load time is quite short compared to most other blu ray players iv owned.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son-in-law for a gift. He loved it. I viewed an animated scene and an action scene on it the other night and both had awesome pictures. It really brings out the images--giving them a depth. I'm supposing it was easy to set up because I heard no complaints about it. He is wanting an attachment so he can go online to download videos but hasn't found it in stock yet. He and my daughter are very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Gooding

customer_reviews.title: Third Brand is a Charm
customer_reviews.text: This player was very easy to set up. Within 30 minutes I had it installed, Netflix and HuluPlus set up and was watching a DVD. It comes with many apps, some of which are great, some not so great. The remote is very light and easy to use. I would recommend this player over any Vizio or Samsung on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Dave R.

customer_reviews.title: looks so good now i need a new TV
customer_reviews.text: This is my first blu ray player before buying is I used my [[ASIN:B0014UOJM0 Pioneer DV-410V-K Multi-Format 1080p Upscaling DVD Player. I still use my pioneer to watch dvds I feel it does a better job of up-converting than the sony. The sony as a blu ray player is off da hook(really good)! Its easy to set up and the picture looks great. I find myself on amazom buying blu rays every week. The movies look so good on this sony that I can't wait to upgrade from my old 2008 philips 42 lcd to a [[ASIN:B0036WT3XY Samsung PN50C6500 50-Inch 1080p Plasma HDTV . For the price and how good this blu ray player works its a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: jujushaller

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I love love love blu-ray, and this is a pretty reliable player. I originally bought this for our bedroom TV, thus it barely gets used. It sat in our room for 6 months or so and I tried to watch a movie and the HDMI port was vary touchy. The littlest bump or even heavy bass coming from the TV made it loose it's picture. Ever since, I have been paranoid about what else just might randomly go to crap.
customer_reviews.author: T Holz

customer_reviews.title: Decent player
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these players and they work well. I am not able to get it to stream movies from my Windows XP PC like I can with my PS3 media server but I haven't really tried to hard to get it to work either. One of my players makes a vibrating noise sometimes and I am not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Nixa

customer_reviews.title: Solid blu-ray player. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first blu-ray player and I have no complaints. If you're like me and you just want a solid quality player to handle your viewing pleasures then look no further. I've read a few reviews about the load up speed being slow and this player does offer a setting to speed up the start up process, but I found it unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: davidh1321

customer_reviews.title: great dvd player
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these for various rooms in the house. The DVD Blu Ray has been great - no skipping or issues during playback. The internet-enabled Netflix streaming has also been great - both wired and wireless. I like this better than the Roku devices I was previously using. I highly recommend this for all of the features and a great price! The user interface is easily learned and the software updates are available through the internet. The only negative I have to report is that one drive tray when opening/closing is rather noisy. Other than that - no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Don Metzler

customer_reviews.title: Learn about (Sony) products at (Sony Style) before buying. etc.
customer_reviews.text: Wireless Ready vs. Wireless Included: We bought a Sony LCD TV that included the Sony USB wireless adapter. We took that adapter and put it on the BDP-S370 Blu-Ray player for use in the living room, and the bedroom's new Sony LCD TV was wired with CAT-6 wire for the Ethernet network. The USB adpater is supposed to be Wireless-N, and the bedroom LCD TV is too far from our router to get a good N signal. It helps to read the product description at sonystyle.com. Sony Style has good description of current products. I am thinking of getting a second Sony BDP-S370 Blu-Ray player to put in the bedroom, wired Ethernet for that room.
customer_reviews.author: Z. A.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blu-ray player two years ago and it's performing wonderfully. It has great built quality. It's true that this blu-ray player doesn't have wi-fi, but that doesn't really bother me. I'm just happy that it can play a majority of my mkv file that are stored in my external hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Sony BDP-S370-Great Player
customer_reviews.text: I found the Sony BDP-S370 Blu-ray player to be an easy player to connect via an Ethernet cable to my router. I was able to connect to Netflix without a problem. There have been times when viewing a movie, that it pauses while loading data. This more than likely is the fault of my DSL connection and not the player. The start up time is much faster than my Toshiba HD DVD player. So far it has played all Blu-ray DVDs without a problem. Overall, is is a good value, with a fast delivery from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CharCol

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty upset that Amazon and now Netflix are not supported on this device. I need another device that will support them. So annoyed!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great player
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with my purchase. There are some minor issues. When streaming music from your PC you can't browse your music library. Kind of a bummer. You can't do anything with Netflix except view your instant queue. No browsing, no adjusting the order of your queue, no adding to your queue, no rating. You can remove items from the instant queue. I can live with all that, though. I wish the disc didn't start automatically when placed in the tray. All around minor issues. For $99 I am very, very satisfied. The picture is amazing even on my 720p LCD. Looking at getting a 46" LED LCD now, I can't wait to see Blu-Ray on that.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Surely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Set-up was a snap...almost plug and play. Works as advertised. Read other reviews and can't understand how anyone was surprised that a USB device was necessary for wireless operation. Seemed clear to me! Works very well with ethernet connection. Waiting for the wireless adapter to arrive. I just ordered one. Blu Ray and std DVDs all look and sound great on our SONY Bravia TV (via Yamaha receiver).
customer_reviews.author: on-line buyer

customer_reviews.title: It's a Sony - as expected
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have good internet connection so I didn't get to use the content. Loaded and played BD's excellently.
customer_reviews.author: Jgtabletlady

customer_reviews.title: Small, Compact, Region Free
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of overseas movies and needed a region free disc player, this is great for the basement where the entertainment area has limited space. I can watch all my movies while working out and play movies from my USB harddrive when I want to.
customer_reviews.author: WArnold

customer_reviews.title: satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Sony Blue ray player and Sony Bravda 40 inch TV and were able to set it up with a bit of struggle and are satisfied that we made the proper choice as a result of reading the reviews and looking at the TV department at a local store. We aren't very tech knowlegeable, but after using for several weeks are satisfied with it's use. We have rented several blue Ray Movie Disk and are really pleased. Really glad we chose the 120hz TV to get the higher frame rate. We expected high satisfaction and got it! Good luck in your choice.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: I liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for 95 plus shipping in 2011 and it is still working perfectly as I use it a lot. Good for an inexpensive player.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndon

customer_reviews.title: Great player
customer_reviews.text: Researched forever before ordering this blue ray player. Wanted one that would stream Netflix onto our hd tv. Works really nice and the wifi setup was really easy. Would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: wins

customer_reviews.title: Sony Winner
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for me as I was looking for a simple player that would be easy to set and operate. This product met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Larkins

customer_reviews.title: Still working after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought the WiFi antenna for it. Great for Netflix if you have the bandwidth. Does a good job with standard DVDs. Can't tell much difference from the BluRays.
customer_reviews.author: coke

customer_reviews.title: Great little piece of tech
customer_reviews.text: It's inexpensive and does exactly what it's supposed to do, be simple and stream media from my internet content providers. Darn thing is so good it's addictive. I could veg for hours watching this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: GymBum

customer_reviews.title: Great low profile Blu-Ray player
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit at a ridiculously low price from Amazon (less that $110) and it performs well. I've played Blu-Rays for hours and the unit stays cool. The extreme low profile (less than 2") and coolness of operation means this unit can be put in a tight spot on a shelf or in a cabinet without fear of overheating. No upscaling of standard DVDs so I wouldn't recommend it as your only DVD Player but for price and performance playing Blu-Ray discs it's a real value.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A. Terry Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet tried the online streaming options as I have a PS3 for that and didn't want to purchase an additional USB wireless connector. Works like a charm, especially in conjunction with other Sony products. I connected using HDMI from blu-ray out to Sony TV and used the optical cable to go from blu-ray out to receiver. Note that you may have to run thru the on-screen setup to tell the player to actually USE the optical out cable. Oh, and the model is very slim, taking up little vertical space.
customer_reviews.author: zep

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up Sony Blu Ray
customer_reviews.text: This Sony blu ray is top notch...It's not the newest "cookie cutter" model, but it is a no nonsense player that operates smoothly w/o any issues (quiet operation)...The only drawback is the lack of built in Internet access capabity, which is quickly remedied with a not included Sony Wifi adapter, which isn't cheap ($70-$80). Nonetheless, I would definitely recommend this player to anyone looking for one that does what it's supposed to do like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: 954Rolo

customer_reviews.title: Sony Blu Ray Player
customer_reviews.text: It does everything I expected and works great with my Sony TV. Can hit power on the player and the TV changes inputs which is nice. Main purpose was I wanted to subscribe to Amazon Instant Video but it also has Netflix and Hulu so all my online subscriptions are on one player. I can move my Netflix blu ray to another room. Its all good!! Also, the vendor shipped the unit very fast. I was surprised how quickly it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: CatfishGreg

customer_reviews.title: Good for my TOSLINK needs
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a refurbished to keep using my Sony wireless headphones which require toslink connnection to the blue-ray player. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Bru Huf

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: It had more than the standard HDMI connections needed. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Von bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to use as a BluRay player but just as important were the internet apps. I watch a lot of streaming video now. I've had the player for about a month. Setup and connection to my home router was painless and have never had any connection problems so far. I like the You-Tube app I was a little disappointed in the Netflix app because you can only select whats in your queue, but I'm hoping that maybe Sony/Netflix will spiff it up later. Love the remote layout as I do most Sony products anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good Blu Ray Player
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these on Thanksgiving and upon arrival, I quickly noticed that there isn't an WiFi adapter with the player. This is my main concerned as I haven't found an acceptable adapter to work (I don't want to spend another $80 for the Sony adapter). Other than that, Netflix, Amazon, Pandora, Slacker, etc. all work great (I have one player connected through Ethernet cable). I recommend this item but make sure you either buy the $80 Sony WiFi adapter or don't mess with the WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: tklemp

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Netflix viewing
customer_reviews.text: Good product that I think is the least expensive way to stream video from Netflix. Only downside, the current software doesn't allow you to search for movies or shows on-line. You go to Netflix.com to search and place items in que. When you turn on the Blu-Ray player, Netflix is one of the on-line services and your selections show up for instant viewing. When you subscribe to Netflix, you tell it you are using this device and enter a code to activate. Relatively simple.
customer_reviews.author: Red Ed

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Not 3D, but I didn't want that anyway. Does what I want it to do, no problems so far. Load times are ok.
customer_reviews.author: chanzg

customer_reviews.title: SATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: ONLY HAS ONE HDMI PORT. DIDNT KNOW I NEEDED MORE. NOTE TO SELF-- THIS IS NOT A PRODUCT I SHOULD BUY ON LINE.
customer_reviews.author: Cookeville, TN

customer_reviews.title: Sony BDP-S370 Blu-ray Disc Player
customer_reviews.text: The player has developed a problem. After being on for about an hour every time it is used, the player gets a loud vibration noise. If it is off for a few hours it will go away until you run it for more than an hour again. The picture is very good.
customer_reviews.author: downthehatch

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: works great will run netflix after patch update which was easy and quick has lots of streaming choices and the player looks good =]
customer_reviews.author: PhantomWraith

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a quality blu-ray player without having to spend a ton of money, and this was it. While it doesn't have 3D capability (who's going to use it anyway?) it has all the features we were looking for, and it was right in our budget. I would definitley recommend this to anyone looking for an affordable, high quality blu-ray player.
customer_reviews.author: Delime

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This player is a great deal for the price! The picture is great once you play around with the settings. The internet streaming works very well when directly connected to the router. Streaming a movie from Netflix worked well, but streaming a movie during heavy internet usage times causes the movie to slow down. Would definitely recommend this blu-ray player.
customer_reviews.author: 4natural

customer_reviews.title: I love the product quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product quality, design and image quality is great, you can update your program on the network and it keeps you up to date and running so eficciente, I have several products of this brand and all are beautiful and sophisticated yet timeless design.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Blu-ray Disc Player
customer_reviews.text: I had the disc player installed professionally which costs more than the player itself, but all's well the ends well. The player has so far worked very smoothly for both DVDs and Blu-ray discs. I used to clean Netflix DVDs thoroughly and that didn't always work. I don't clean the DVDs now and they play immediately. I have played a CD and the results are very satisfactory. I have not tried any of the bells and whistles. The manual is not very helpful but in my experience with electronics it's nearly always trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Bonine

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have it hooked up to a Vizio tv and the quality is great, even with dvds. I love the internet video feature, especially Pandora, Netflix, and the video on demand from Amazon. However, the quality for Netflix streaming can sometimes be a little blurry, but I think that has more to do with my internet connection. I am overall happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: For all those people out there who can't decide which Blu-Ray to get as their first...GET THIS ONE! Its cheap, easy to setup, easy to use and offers quality on par with the more expensive models! If u just want to improve your home-theatre or TV/DVD setup...this will do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Aamer

customer_reviews.title: Blue ray player
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product at very good price. Does everything it said, love the internet. I use eithernet connection for internet stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: Sony Blue-Ray
customer_reviews.text: Works like a new one,very good price point at time of purchase. However do not use very often due to time constraints.
customer_reviews.author: john coleman

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I like this DVD player. I'm happy with the picture quality. Only drawback is that this DVD player is not compatible with any other wireless dongle. It would have been great if this product would work with wireless dongles other than Sony ones.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Razvi

customer_reviews.title: Sony BDP-S370 Blu-ray Disc Player
customer_reviews.text: SO FAR I'VE ONLY HAD THIS PRODUCT A COUPLE MONTHS BUT, TO DATE IT HAS OPERATED WELL AND INSTALLATION WAS EASY. SO.... I'D HAVE TO SAY. FAIR PRICE + QUICK DELIVERY + QUALITY PRODUCT = HAPPY CUSTOMER
customer_reviews.author: James A. Miller II

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous in AR
customer_reviews.text: The Sony BDP-S370 Blu-Ray Players are awesome they exceeded my expectations! They are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Happy,happy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Blu-Ray player.Easy set-up and easy play.Anyone could set this up right away.I am 74 years old and I did it with no problem what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA BRAY

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang for Buck
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Blu Ray player going on a year now and ive had not problems with it, its also nice because of the Sony features you get like access to Netflix, Pandora..etc..
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product Sony BDP S370 two months back, and It is very easy to setup the BD live. As usual Sony picture quality is awesome even with $1 HDMI cable. No Cons. about this product. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jagadhish Nagothi

customer_reviews.title: Love the DVD player, hate the lack of options for Wireless USB adapter.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a second blu-ray player so the kids can stream Amazon on Demand and Netflix in the playroom. We use both. This DVD player had the options and works great. The only problem I have is with SONY not the actual device. It's tough to find a Wireless USB Adapter that is compatible if you find one at all. I'm not going to run a 20 foot ethernet cable across the house. I don't want to buy something else in order to stream Amazon on Demand and Netflix. Just make the players wireless or make them play nice with non SONY devices.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Solid player for BD-R playback
customer_reviews.text: If compatibility with BD-R disks is important to you, this is a solid player. I went through several Samsung players with spotty success before finding this model. I have tested with Verbatim and Kodak media, and found it to be reliable. It's a bargain for less than 100 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: L.R. Leed

customer_reviews.title: Best ever blue-ray player
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blue ray player that I ever had. The picture is crystal clear and so far it has served me well. Great product. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gene C. Sian

customer_reviews.title: excellent option within a tight budget
customer_reviews.text: if you're looking for a blu ray player with all the features under $100 this is your choice. don't think about it much
customer_reviews.author: Michael Liberman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice entry level blu-ray with internet
customer_reviews.text: I have had no issues with this. I think this is a solid entry level blu-ray, and it has a ton of features you can access if you hook it up to the internet. Picture quality of blu-rays on my Panasonic plasma is great.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin A. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blu-ray after a couple of reviews on players. Im a sony man and I couldn't be happier. No problems with getting on line. I purchased the LG 55' 120mhz. They work well together like peanut butter and jelly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Picture
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son-in-law was so excited about this. The movies are so much nicer to watch and could never ask for a nicer gift. That means I'll have to purchase another one for my husband and myself.
customer_reviews.author: Marie F. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: Setup of this product was simple and usage of the same is also user friendly. I am not using the Internet streaming of video yet, so I cannot speak to this feature.
customer_reviews.author: JJMB

customer_reviews.title: Only one problem
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with this product is the fact to have a wireless connection you have to buy a specific usb chip from sony which is almost the same price of the player. Otherwise it works great just upset that the chip is so much.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: wi-fi ADAPTER ready, adapter not included
customer_reviews.text: Read the specs. You must connect this to your router via your ethernet cable (usually yellow), or buy an adapter. They didn't intend to mislead us, but we must read the complete specs.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This item is great but if you are planning to use as a wireless unit you will need to by an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: RBD54

customer_reviews.title: Blu-Ray
customer_reviews.text: This Blu-ray player works just fine. I am happy with my purchase. Sony makes a good product when it comes to electronics.
customer_reviews.author: dslur29

customer_reviews.title: the player is good but the remote does not work
customer_reviews.text: I know this was a refurbished item, but it was advertized as complete & working fine... oh well, watch out
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: AreK
customer_reviews.text: My friend helped me choose this particular Blue-ray player and I don't regret it. Size is good , picture is great, price was right, what more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: arek

customer_reviews.title: wifi adapter?
customer_reviews.text: Can you use any type of usb wifi adapter or do you have to buy a special Sony one? I just purchased online for my uncle and my brother was mad i didn't get one with built in wifi. He told me i would have to buy a 70 dollar special Sony adapter. I hope he is wrong. I do think it is something to consider when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: music forever

customer_reviews.title: I love this Blue Ray player
customer_reviews.text: This blue ray player is perfect. I have used other brands and none of them work as good as this one. The seller sent it quickly and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great Blu-Ray Player!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to navigate menus. Great picture. Easy setup. Menus are simple and could look more aesthetically pleasing, but I am not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: er2152ls

customer_reviews.title: BlueRay DVD player
customer_reviews.text: My daughter helped me with an order via Amazon. She set it up with ease. The picture with DVD came out very sharp and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Netflix user interface is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this Sony blue ray player since I already have a Samsung in my master bedroom. What a mistake! This blue ray player will not let you browse or search Netflix, you have to add the movies to your instant que in order to watch them on the player. My Samsung and XBOX allow you to browse, search and have suggestions was well. I am very dissapointed with Sony. Sony representative told me all Sony Blue Ray players have the same restriction. Returning it and getting the Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Politano

customer_reviews.title: blueray
customer_reviews.text: i got this weeks ago i m very happy to have this the bdp s370 player rocks i just wish that it cane with the remote
customer_reviews.author: raymond

customer_reviews.title: good value, registration a pain
customer_reviews.text: Solid product, good price, easy set up except for the registration with Sony and Amazon in order to access material from the Internet. That was confusing and a very large pain. Player is sleek, easy to hook up. Picture quality, loading speed, remote and menus are fine. This is the WIRED version of the product, not wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Balrog

customer_reviews.title: front door came off within a month of having. ...
customer_reviews.text: front door came off within a month of having. will not buy another Sony product. have had lots of problems with different Sony products.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rakes

customer_reviews.title: Sony Blu-ray beats Sharp Blu-ray! Don't buy Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Sony to replace a really DULL product from Sharp. If someone offers you a free product from Sharp, say "No, Thank You!" It is not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Brice

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Wont's Access Blockbuster On-Demand
customer_reviews.text: I really like this player: Great picture, fast load, good on-screen menu, and easy to use remote. I am really disappointed that it will not access BlockBuster on-Demand.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: It's wireless ready, NOT wireless capable
customer_reviews.text: For streaming wirelessly you are required to purchase a proprietary USB Wireless dongle from Sony. The dongle is overpriced at $75+. While not exactly false advertising it is certainly misleading. My perception of Sony as a future provider is certainly greatly reduced as a result. Didn't come with a HDMI cable making it useless out-of-the-box. Need to purchase one separately. As a Blu-Ray player it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Heggie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 1 weekend.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the weekend I set it up. The next time I used it I couldn't access the the menu or anything else. After doing all the toubleshooting steps with the Sony tech I wound up having to send the player back for repair/replacement. While it was working it was great, but 1 weekends use? Seriously? I am still waiting to hear back from Sony and have no idea how long this will take, in the mean time I am out access to movies, etc. Since this is my main way to watch TV I am quite inconvienced.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Bird Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great, dependable Sony product. Solid player. NO ZOOM.
customer_reviews.text: Great Sony product. NO ZOOM. Bought Sony AV studio player with surround sound and speakers and 260+ watt amplifier that made this obsolete less than 6 months from purchase. A very nice unit but when I found some favorite video games that supported surround sound I never turned this on again and only use the Sony AV home theater system... Again, would've given 5 stars if it had ZOOM.
customer_reviews.author: microphage

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Sony Lock-in!
customer_reviews.text: When you read that this player is "wifi-ready", or (if you read more carefully) that it requires a "USB wifi adapter", don't get any illusions that you'll be able to slap a $20 USB wifi dongle in there and expect it to work. No, no, no, you need to shell out $75-$80 to buy a Sony-branded USB wifi dongle, probably made in the same factory that made your $20 one but bearing the highly-valued Sony brand name; that kicks this player up (unnecessarily, IMHO) into a significantly higher price bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Davenport Bradley 🎶

customer_reviews.title: A little flash, not much quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this BD player to complete my man-cave redesign. It worked fine for the first two months, then it would not read any disc put into it BD or other. While researching issue, I found this is a common issue with this particular Sony model. Save your money and get something else. This model is a piece of garbage. No, I did not bother with a repair. I don't have that kind of time or ability to absorb aggravation. I just went out to Wal-Mart, found a LG model on sale for $92 and called it a day. Oh, and the LG interface is 100 times nicer than the Sony one. However, the Sony did look better externally.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Alexander

customer_reviews.title: PLUCKING A THIS THING IS HOT
customer_reviews.text: WOW IT WORKS LIKE THEY SAID IT WOULD AND THE SET UP WAS AS EASY AS PIE SO FAR SO GOOD
customer_reviews.author: RICK

customer_reviews.title: Picture "Quality"
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Blu-Ray player this year one was a Magna... one was a Pionee...and this one. This one,by far,has the fastest startup time of the 3 but saying that I have to say this: Out of the three players,this one has the poorest picture quality of the bunch. It does have a few more features then the others but the bottom line is,we buy these for the picture quality. I wish I had spent a little more and gotten another Pionee... BTW, the other 2 plyers were both broken by my grandkids...maybe I should have bought my players for durabillity instead of picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Miller

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product assumming since it advertises you can use it with Netflix that you could use it with Netflix. So after buying it I had to buy an internet card and another connection wire, very expensive. Signed up for Netlix and can use it on my WII as well as my IPAD with no issues. This machine is awful, constant interruptions, problems getting the movie to show more than a couple minutes. Sony should be ashamed of themselves for selling this piece of @@@### Sony needs to fix their interface problem
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Misleading re: WiFi capability
customer_reviews.text: This product description is very misleading because you have to buy an additional $70 WiFi adapter to utilize any of the wireless network capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: M. Steele

customer_reviews.title: parts not included
customer_reviews.text: I love the blue ray player, but thought I would be able to stream right away. The description failed to tell me that a $76.00 wireless adapter would be needed for any connection to my wireless network.
customer_reviews.author: canlouis

product_meta.title: Sony BDP-S370 Blu-ray Disc Player
product_meta.description:
With the Sony BDP-S370 Blu-ray Disc Player enjoy Blu-ray Disc movies in Full HD 1080p and improve the quality of DVDs to near HD. Play your favorite movies faster than ever or connect to the internet and instantly access a wide variety of movies, TV shows, music and more. Plus turn your iPhone or iPod touch into a remote control by downloading a free app.

AMAZON.COM


Enjoy Blu-ray Disc movies in Full HD1080p and improve the quality of DVDs to near HD with the Sony BDP-S370 Blu-ray Disc Player. Play your favorite movies faster than ever and access a wide variety of movies, TV shows, and music streaming from the Internet plus turn your Apple iPhone or iPod touch into a remote control by downloading a free app.

Enjoy Blu-ray Disc movies and DVDs or connect to the internet and access movies, TV shows music and more. With the quick start feature turned on, the start-up time is quicker and disc loading is faster than previous models--with a start-up time from power off in about 3 seconds. 

If you have an iPhone or iPod touch or compatible Android-powered device, you can download the free BD Remote app and then use it to control playback on this Sony Blu-ray Disc Player. Additionally, you'll have the ability to access a Blu-ray Disc's details such as jacket artwork, actor, and production information (via Sony's Entertainment Database Browser using Gracenote technologies) as well as search for additional video clips online.



With BRAVIA Internet Video content, you can connect to the Internet and instantly stream a wide variety of movies, TV shows, videos and music from leading content providers including Netflix, Amazon Instant Video, YouTube, Slacker, and more. 

KEY FEATURES
Full HD 1080p Video Output: Get the most out of your 1080p player with Full HD 1080p output. Enjoy Blu-ray Disc movies in brilliant high-definition resolution or upscale the quality of your DVDs to near HD.

Quick Start/Quick Load: Begin enjoying your entertainment faster than ever.

BRAVIA Internet Video: Instantly stream a wide variety of movies, TV episodes, videos and music from a large selection of entertainment apps including Netflix, YouTube, Pandora, Slacker--the list goes on and on. (Learn More)

Cross Search: Easily search select BRAVIA Internet Video partners for entertainment or information related to the disc that you are enjoying.

Gracenote Metadata Service: Instantly gives you access to detailed information about the movies you are watching.

Share Personal Entertainment (DLNA): Share music, videos, and photos between compatible devices using your DLNA home network.

Dolby TrueHD internal decoding and bitstream output via HDMI: Dolby TrueHD and dts-HD (Master Audio and High Resolution Audio) codecs reproduces high definition sound with 7.1 channels of discrete audio so you can enjoy uncompromised audio.

Mobile Device Remote Control App: Download the free "BD remote" app to your iPhone/iPod touch or compatible Android device and turn it into a versatile remote--access movie info, search entertainment topics and more.

USB Input: Share your videos or photos on the big screen or listen to your favorite music. Simply connect your digital camera, USB-enabled MP3 player, or USB storage device.

Wi-Fi Adapter Ready: Easily connect to your wireless broadband network with a USB Wi-Fi adapter.

Rear ports (see larger image). KEY SPECIFICATIONS
 * 3D ready: No 
 * Disc compatibility: BD-R/RE; BD-ROM; DVD±R/RW; CD-R/RW 
 * JPEG playback: Yes (BD-R/REDVD+RW/+R/-RW/-R/CD-R,RW) 
 * MP3 playback: Yes (BD-R/RE/DVD+RW/+R/-RW/-R/CD-R,RW) 
 * AVC-HD playback: Yes (DVD+R/RW/-R/-RW) 
 * Wireless LAN: Ready (via USB) 
 * HDMI output: 1 (rear) 
 * Component output: 1 (rear) 
 * Composite A/V output: 1 (rear) 
 * USB 2.0: 2 (1 rear, 1 front) 
 * Ethernet: 1 (rear) 
 * Analog audio output: 1 (rear) 
 * Digital audio output: 1 coaxial, 1 optical (both rear) 
 * Dimensions: 16.93 x 8.11 x 1.41 inches (WxDxH) 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
BDP-S370 Blu-ray Disc Player, remote control (with batteries), AV cable, operating instructions

LEARN MORE
BRAVIA INTERNET VIDEO
Have your favorite internet content delivered to your TV screen via this Sony Blu-ray Disc Player with BRAVIA Internet Video. Stream movies, videos, music and more with BRAVIA Internet Video from a wide variety of sources and services, including:

Amazon Instant Video provides instant access to over 50,000 hit movies and TV shows directly on your Sony BRAVIA HDTV. Watch new release movies as soon as they're on DVD and TV shows the day after they air, with thousands of titles available in HD--all commercial free. Netflix: Instantly watch thousands of TV episodes and movies streamed from Netflix right to your Sony BRAVIA HDTV--watch as much as you want, any time you want. (Netflix unlimited membership required for Netflix feature functionality.) Crackle: The next-generation video entertainment network with hundreds of movies, TV shows, and original series from the vast Sony Pictures library. Pandora Internet Radio: Free, personalized internet radio playing only music you love. Pandora brings an effortless personal soundtrack into your living room. Enter your favorite artists and enjoy stations created just for you. Rate songs as they play, because Pandora caters to your tastes and adapts stations to your feedback on the spot.
